user_query: I'm organizing a gaming tournament and I need to verify the usernames of the participants in different games. Can you provide me with the usernames for Arena of Valor and Point Blank using the ID Game Checker API? Additionally, fetch some recipes from the Minecraft API to prepare snacks for the event.

TaskList.description: Use the ID Game Checker API to verify the usernames for participants in Arena of Valor.
Use the ID Game Checker API to verify the usernames for participants in Point Blank.
Fetch snacks recipes from the Minecraft API for the tournament event.
